plc.common.licenseerrordetail: Communication to the Data Layer failed.

plc.editretain.info: {{allocated}} Bytes of {{total}} Bytes reserved for PLC
plc.editretain.title: Allocate PLC retain memory (Bytes)
plc.editretain.maximumerror: The entered value has to be lower than the available memory
plc.editretain.minimumerror: The entered value has to be higher than {{minimumInputLimit}} bytes
plc.editretain.minimuminfo: {{minimumInputLimit}} bytes is the minimum allocatable memory
plc.editretain.roundinfo: The input value is rounded up to a multiple of 8
plc.editretain.norebootperm: You do not have permission to reboot the controller

plc.apps.title: Applications
plc.apps.engineeringinfo: ctrlX PLC Engineering is a Windows application used to create programs in IEC 61131 and to load them to a ctrlX OS device. ctrlX PLC Engineering can be downloaded from the ctrlX WORKS page in the {{ ctrlXStore }}.
plc.apps.disableallstart: Only enabled when the applications are not in 'Exception' or 'Retain Mismatch' state
plc.apps.disablestart: Only enabled when the application is not in 'Exception' or 'Retain Mismatch' state
plc.apps.resettooltip: Click here to select reset options
plc.apps.disableresetwarm: Only enabled when the application is not in 'Retain Mismatch' state
plc.apps.disableallresetwarm: Only enabled when the applications are not in 'Retain Mismatch' state
plc.apps.exceptionstate: Application is in error state. For further details, please open the ctrlX PLC Engineering and check 'PLC Log' and 'call tree'.
plc.apps.flowcontrolstate: 'Flow control mode' is active in the application. To disable the 'flow control mode', please toggle it in the ctrlX PLC Engineering.
plc.apps.forcevariablestate: 'Force values' is active in the application. To stop forcing, please execute the command 'unforce values' in the ctrlX PLC Engineering.
plc.apps.retainmismatchstate: Application loaded with retain mismatch. A 'Reset Cold' is required to run the application!
plc.apps.preconditions: Please ensure that all preconditions are met!
plc.apps.coldwarmdescription: The command results in a {{actionText}} of the application on the controller
plc.apps.origindescription: The command deletes the application on the controller
plc.apps.startstoptitle: Do you want to {{actionText}} the application?
plc.apps.resettitle: Do you want to perform the operation {{actionText}}?
plc.apps.nopermtostartctrlx: You do not have permission to start ctrlX PLC Engineering

plc.bootApplication.noPermission: You do not have required permissions to fetch the boot application data

plc.projectInfo.name: Name
plc.projectInfo.noPermission: You do not have required permissions to fetch the project information

plc.appNotInit.error.header: The PLC app is currently not available (Error: {{availabilityErrorCode}})
plc.appNotInit.description: This is most likely due to one of the following reasons:
plc.appNotInit.servicemode: The 'Service Mode' is currently active. Please go to the {{value}} switch to 'Operation Mode' and try again.
plc.appNotInit.appInitializing: The app is currently being initialized. This may take a while, please {{value}} the page.
plc.appNotInit.noPermission: You do not have the required permissions to see this page.
plc.appNotInit.permission.title: Minimal required permissions for this page:
plc.appNotInit.permission.list1: Data Layer scopes: Data Layer View

notavailable.li1: Service mode is active. Switch to Operation mode on the | Apps page|.
notavailable.li2: The app is currently being initialized. This may take a while, please | refresh | the page.

nopermission.p1: You do not have the required permissions.
nopermission.p2: Minimal required permissions for this page:
